amendment.description: Amendment sought to place a cap of $520 million on the amount of funds that would be available in the Affordable Housing Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to set a cap on the amount of funds available in the Affordable Housing Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 256 (Roll no. 393).
